concepts.description: to make an important development or achievement
to officially invite a person to take a position in a company
to make money from a business
to make progress
to deal with financial accounts within an organization or for an individual
to prepare to respond to unforeseen challenges, issues, risks, and their impact
someone who manages marketing processes through all stages
a complicated set of issues that you find difficult to deal with or understand
to finish work on time
a situation when two or more companies, organizations, etc., join together
to reduce the harmful or damaging effects of something
having a motive to do or achieve something
to move from one job to another but at a similar level of responsibility and pay
to unfairly change the rules in a situation or an activity to gain an advantage
to have more money or a better social position than you had before
a company that has business in two or more countries
to turn off all sounds on your phone
helpful, useful, or good for both people or groups involved
working standard office hours
when employees officially agree not to share the company's secret information
to not be able to deal with challenges or tasks satisfactorily
health and safety regulations in a workplace
working without a team, by yourself
not being dealt with or considered, because it isn't urgent or important
